body: Okay, so he could have easily sent the rapist to prison. He threatened his life and held him hostage. This would be such an easy case to win.

@kurottk If hentai was realistic, it wouldn't be as bad... these artist purposely make things less realistic to draw more emotion.... in a hentai, you'd probably feel more pain from some girl you had a minor crush on having sex with her boyfriend than from your real life wife cheating on you.... or your mom finding another lover (which, in real life isn't that bad, though maybe annoying at worst) yet somehow worse than real life cheating...

@TheBLACKDahlia To be fair, a lot of these artist are dudes that probably would never have sex unless if they paid for it or raped someone... so they probably have a fantasy of making guys who can actually get relationships fail and lose to rapist....

body:
This is a pretty delusional manga, in the real world the guy would have been arrested and sent to prison if he tried something like this, and usually ppl who go as far as breaking into someones house to assault the husband and rape the wife usually isn't going to be nice enough to spare there lives.

This guy is clearly dangerous, the guy is a stalker and is unafraid to use physical violence,and in fact he even takes pleasure and feels no remorse for doing said acts. The entire family would be dead if he managed to restrain all of them, because he would dispose of them to get rid of any witnesses to the crime he commited.
